snippet.title: Overwatch 2 x TRANSFORMERS | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
From lessons of the past, the future is forged with Overwatch 2 x TRANSFORMERS!

Stand side by side with the AUTOBOTS - Reinhardt as Optimus Prime Reinhardt, Bastion as Bumblebee, and Illari as Arcee. Or you can make them pay with Ramattra as Megatron, the leader of the DECEPTICONS. Which side will you choose?

Overwatch 2 x TRANSFORMERS arrives in-game today.

Overwatch 2 is free to play for everyone on console & PC!

_
Follow #Overwatch2 for the latest news:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoverwatch
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@overwatch
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch 
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch
